alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 7:32PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Mobile and western Baldwin Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 732 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles northeast of Chickasaw to near Point Clear. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Daphne, Fairhope, Saraland, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Spanish Fort, Creola, Point Clear, Stockton, Stapleton, Axis, Mount Vernon, Silverhill, I65 And I165, I65 And AL 225, I65 And AL 158 and Movico. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland
